data.text: Way too many adds. I tried to follow the instructions on how to upgrade and couldn't locate. I sent an email and to date, no response. The most annoying thing is the connection issue. I have to unplug the TV each day for the app to connect. After that first time, the connection is fine. It's also annoying that the app times out after non use for a minute. To keep having to connect is ridiculous

data.text: About every 3rd tap on the remote you have to contend with an add. It's horrible if you are attempting to search for anything! The remote doesn't stay connected so if you need to pause something after it has sat idle for a bit, best of luck to you. The best feature is when the remote is connected, you can turn the TV both on and off. Honestly, that option and the keyboard are the only features that warrant 2‚≠ês. Otherwise, the lifetime price of $9.99 would've been an overchargeüò≠

data.text: First of all, there was a purchase price for this app. Now it has ads, and not just at the top, it will expand the ad to full screen while you are using it (every 4th click) so that you will open the advertisement and exit what you were doing. It also won't stay connected to any devices after sitting still for a few moments. I've had this for several months (maybe even a year by now) and I don't like it. This one does have a few extra features over free ones but very frustrating to use.

data.text: The only good thing about this is that I'm not having to wait for a new remote to be shipped out.
